Capgemini UK plc

Network Security Design and Engineering

Capgemini’s service can provide security assessment, design, planning and architecture services to assist in the development and deployment of a scalable, maintainable security system for enterprise and cloud services networks. This can incorporate scoping, requirements, stakeholder management workshops, threat, vulnerability and , risk assessments, and implementation of networks with security.

Features

  • Can review and evaluate your current network architecture
  • Can provide network security design and engineering using standard approaches
  • Can help deploy network security to track evolving security threats
  • Can provide network Security operational processes for configuration and changemanagement
  • Can provide dengineering of network security monitoring solutions
  • Can provide network security architecture and strategy documentation
  • Can help with architecture implementation plan for network security
  • Can provide network security governance, change control and maintenance plans
  • Can provide TOGAF and CLAS certified consultants for security architecture
  • Can provide threat, risk and requirements documentation for network architecture

Benefits

  • Can provide scoping, stakeholder management workshops, context and vision documents
  • Can provide threat, risk and requirements assessments for network architecture
  • Can provide validation of conceptual and logical network security strategy
  • Can help extend enterprise architecture to include network security architecture
  • Can help analyse network architecture for continuous security improvements
  • Can provide network security architecture, risk and compliance documentation
  • Can help implement network intrusion prevention, and malware protection solutions
  • Can help implement remote access web threat, and email solutions
  • Can help with selection of vendor infrastructure to suit requirements
  • Can help clients progress network security compliance cetification and accreditation
